titleInfo.title: Letter, H.R. Frost, in Charleston, S.C., to J.G.M. Ramsey in Charleston, S.C. 1829 Mar. 17

mods.abstract: 1829 Mar. 17, H.R. Frost, Dean of the Medical College, Charleston, S.C., to J.G.M. Ramsey, Charleston, S.C. Invitation to a supper to be given by the faculty of the Medical College. Enclosed are calling costs of Col. Hayne and Mitchell King.
